channel.title: The Lunatic New Role
channel.description:
A Neutral Killer
**Lore**
> A deranged misfit, who had escaped the darkest dungeon in the empire. He gets entertainment from the torture of others and fooling those around him, and is ready to take revenge on those who imprisoned him.
**Passives** > Deranged - Whenever a good king or blue dragon is lynched, you will gain one more use of torture. > Master! - Any Tortured Souls will vote the same as you.If someone attacks you, it will be redirected onto one of your tortured souls, if you have no tortured souls you will die, the attacker will be told they were redirected.
**Day Abilities**
> injustice - Make a player look converted if they have a scout on them, or look cult/unseen if checked tonight.(2 uses) > > Puppet Strings - Make any tortured soul speak(similar to troll box, but can include whispers)(infinite amount every day) > **Night Abiltlies** > Torture - Torture a player, if successful they will become "A Tortured Soul", they will be unable to speak or use there abilities, and will die in two days.(1 use) Player Masks - Make a player look like they visited someone who died that night, if no one dies nothing will happen(3 uses)
Please Note:To me this role seems like a hit or a miss, I believe I desperatly need help on this character so please can I have some lol.

item.title: The Lunatic New Role
item.dc:creator: CountVlad
item.description:
A Neutral Killer

Lore

A deranged misfit, who had escaped the darkest dungeon in the empire. He gets entertainment from the torture of others and fooling those around him, and is ready to take revenge on those who imprisoned him.

Passives

Deranged - Whenever a good king or blue dragon is lynched, you will gain one more use of torture.
Master! - Any Tortured Souls will vote the same as you.If someone attacks you, it will be redirected onto one of your tortured souls, if you have no tortured souls you will die, the attacker will be told they were redirected.

Day Abilities

injustice - Make a player look converted if they have a scout on them, or look cult/unseen if checked tonight.(2 uses)

Puppet Strings - Make any tortured soul speak(similar to troll box, but can include whispers)(infinite amount every day)

Night Abiltlies

Torture - Torture a player, if successful they will become “A Tortured Soul”, they will be unable to speak or use there abilities, and will die in two days.(1 use)
Player Masks - Make a player look like they visited someone who died that night, if no one dies nothing will happen(3 uses)

Please Note:To me this role seems like a hit or a miss, I believe I desperatly need help on this character so please can I have some lol.
